name: GeoPlatformer: Switch
description:
GEOPLATFORMER: SWITCH

This is a classic platformer game about geometry!

The world of geometry have a ruler that we called geometry KING, and he not allowed irregular figure exists. And you are an irregular figure and you need to find the weapon to defeat the geometry KING!

Using W to JUMP!

Using A to MOVE LEFT!

Using D to MOVE RIGHT!

Using Enter Released to move between the HEX PORTAL!

You need to collect 15 COINS(pentagon) and find the MASTER PORTAL(circle) to go to the next level! 

Avoid SPIKES(triangle)!

Hope you enjoy this game!

(music is from the website: www.freepd.com)
